CustomField.formula:
If( TEXT(Plan_Type__c) = "Conversion Plan", "", If( ISBLANK(Ubiquity_Plan_Documents_Signed__c), If( Time_to_Complete_Docs__c < 11, "On Track", If( Time_to_Complete_Docs__c > 14, "Behind", "At Risk")),
If( ISBLANK( Custodial_Account_Number_Received__c ), If( Time_to_Account_Number_KPI__c < 26, "On Track", If( Time_to_Account_Number_KPI__c > 35, "Behind", "At Risk")),
If( ISBLANK(Census_and_Eligibility_Uploaded__c ), If( Time_to_Census_KPI__c < 7, "On Track", If( Time_to_Census_KPI__c > 10, "Behind", "At Risk")),
If( ISBLANK( X1st_Payroll_Date__c ), If( Time_to_1st_Payroll_KPI__c < 27, "On Track", If( Time_to_1st_Payroll_KPI__c > 30, "Behind", "At Risk")),
"KPIs Complete" )))))
CustomField.label: Progress Tracker Calc
